properties.description: Adding good column with dot not comma

typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		C_CUSTKEY as short,
		C_NAME as string,
		C_ADDRESS as string,
		C_NATIONKEY as short,
		C_PHONE as string,
		C_ACCTBAL as string,
		C_MKTSEGMENT as string,
		C_COMMENT as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> CustomerDSV
CustomerDSV derive(acctbal = replace(C_ACCTBAL, ',', '.')) ~> CommaToDotColumn
CommaToDotColumn sink(allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	partitionFileNames:['customer_cleaned.dsv'],
	partitionBy('hash', 1),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true) ~> CustomerFinalTable
